participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and analytical, enjoys deep conversations about books and movies.
participant_1.background: I enjoy watching football and hockey games. I love to read. I am a proofreader for a greeting card company. My favorite movie is Goodfellas.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Friendly and creative, loves sharing interests and engaging with others about sports and music.
participant_2.background: My favourite colour is green. My dog is called Alfred. I can play the piano. I am a baseball player. I like to read books about Chinese history.

content.text: Nice to meet you, participant_1. What do you do for fun?
I like to play baseball, read books, and play the piano.
Wow, you're pretty talented! I love reading too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read books about Chinese history. I'm also a big fan of the Harry Potter series.
I've never read any books about Chinese history, but I've heard good things about them. I love Harry Potter too! I've read all of the books and seen all of the movies.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new movie that's coming out next year.
Me too! I'm really curious to see what happens.
I think it's going to be a lot of fun.
I hope so! What other hobbies do you have?
I also like to watch football and hockey games. I'm a big fan of the [user 2's favorite team].
Oh, cool! I like to watch football too. I'm a fan of the [user 1's favorite team].
That's great! We should watch a game together sometime.
Great! We can exchange numbers and talk about it later.
